name: @saucey/feedback-functions
description: Cloud functions for handling user feedback, summarization, and reporting.

scripts.deploy-summary-report: echo 'INFO: This is a sample deploy script. Adjust for your actual deployment needs.' && gcloud functions deploy summarizeAndReportFeedback --trigger-topic weekly-feedback-trigger --runtime nodejs20 --region us-central1 --source . --entry-point summarizeAndReportFeedback
scripts.deploy-cleanup-feedback: echo 'INFO: This is a sample deploy script. Adjust for your actual deployment needs.' && gcloud functions deploy cleanupOldFeedback --trigger-topic monthly-cleanup-trigger --runtime nodejs20 --region us-central1 --source . --entry-point cleanupOldFeedback
